Frequently Asked Questions

Question

When was Casa United Founded ?

Answer

Casa United was founded in the year 2009

Question

Who founded Casa United ?

Answer

Casa United was founded by a group of Youths with it's former being 'Real Jokor'

Question

How many times did Casa United become champions of Bundung ?

Answer

Casa United were crown 10x champions of Bundung

Question

Who is the current head coach ?

Answer

Current head coach is Abdoulie Sanneh who succeeded Bamba Suso

If you want your questions featured want to know stuff not mentioned in the website kindly contact us via our contact page. Our Media team will be in touch
